Footer.slogan: The marketplace for browser-based apps and games.

Pro.subtitle: Upgrade your app with our advanced packages
Pro.loadError: Failed to load packages. Please try again.
Pro.goldDescription: Unlock higher limits, premium storage and priority publish support.
Pro.goldFeatureStorage: Larger upload & storage quota for bundles and assets
Pro.goldFeatureAds: Removes CreateX ads for you and your published apps
Pro.goldFeatureSupport: Priority publish review and dedicated support channel
Pro.noAdsDescription: Remove CreateX ad slots from dashboards and every published experience.
Pro.noAdsFeatureRemoval: Zero ads in the editor, dashboard and your apps
Pro.noAdsFeatureFocus: Keeps players focused on your content (no banners or interstitials)

Login.welcomeBody: Discover, play and publish mini‚Äëapps. Sign in to like apps, publish your own, and sync progress.

Rooms.descriptionDemoCompact: Demo room is public and used for quick testing. Everyone shares the same data.
Rooms.descriptionPrivateCompact: This room has private storage shared only between members with the same PIN.
Rooms.descriptionDemoFull: This demo room is public and designed to showcase the app. Create your own room and PIN for private storage.
Rooms.descriptionPrivateFull: The room you selected has private storage shared with everyone who knows the name and PIN.
Rooms.modeHint: For permanent and private storage, create your own room and PIN.

errors.missingCredentials: Enter a room name and PIN.
errors.generic: Working with rooms is temporarily unavailable.
